The Spectator (2023-2025)

The Spectator is Seattle University's student-run newspaper. I joined The Spectator in fall 2023 as a volunteer designer and became a staff designer in winter quarter. I developed the ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines, collaborated with the editorial layout team, and became proficient in applying the brand guidelines.

In 2024-2025, I stepped into the role of lead designer, collaborating with the editorial team to coordinate design projects and guide a talented group of three layout designers through lively layout nights. I also had the exciting opportunity to create a new logo for a campus podcast, Cherry Street Chat.

Roles:

  • Team Lead
  • Editorial
  • Graphic Design
  • Illustration
  • Brand Identity
